1.content:
As you sit in a Pokémon Center waiting for your Pokémon to get healed you look over the package, a mysterious man gave you. You open it and find a remote control and a note.

If you are reading this you are now the proud new owner of this remote control. With it you can control peoples actions. You might be asking how does it work, well let me tell you.

This remote has many functions...
1. Pause: This will freeze anyone in place stopping them no matter what they were doing
2. Sound Up/Down: Push the up button and the person will start to speak louder then before. Push the down button and the person will speak quieter then before. You can even mute them.
3. Loop: This will make the person do there last action over and over again
4. Power: This will make the person stop what there doing and pass out. Press again to wake them back up.
5. Play: Returns them to normal with no idea what happened

There are other things this remote can do but this is all I will tell you :)

P.S Please be careful the battery drains really fast and takes time to recharge.

You decide to make your first Target...
1.title: The Remote control

11.content:
You hear a beep as the heal light turns on and Nurse Joy calls you in. This is your chance to use the remote, but what if it doesn’t work?

You walk into the room with Nurse Joy. It’s now or never. You press a button on the remote...
11.title: Nurse Joy

113.content: Nurse Joy walks up to you and sits down on the same couch you are sitting on. “So about your Pokémon...” she look you right in the eyes with her legs crossed as she sits there talking to you. You press the button and she says “So about your Pokémon.... So about your Pokémon...” you get off the couch a just look at her. Nurse Joy doesn’t move her eyes are still fixed looking at the spot you were just sitting. “So about your Pokémon...” You now wave your hand in front of her face but still nothing. She doesn’t even blink. “So about your Pokémon...” You now try to get her to move by grabbing one of her arms, but nothing she wouldn’t budge. “So about your Pokémon.” You press anothe button on the remote.
113.title: Loop

1133.content: You now see this a boring and want something else to happen so you press one of the buttons you don’t know about and as you do Nurse Joy uncrosses her legs and gets up off the couch “So about your Pokémon...” she still says as she begins to take off her work uniform and toss it on the ground. Her head was still locked in place, her eyes still looking in the same spot. She sits back down and crosses her legs. “So about your Pokémon...” It looks like the button you pressed only made her take off her uniform. Now as you look at her she’s still wearing her Nurse cap and shoes but now you see her wearing a white bra with a pink flower on both sides and and matching pair of underwear. You press another button.
1133.title: Something New

choices: Can’t help it and unzip your pants
11333.content: Let’s try another new button there’s like 50 buttons on this thing. As you press a new button you see one of Nurse Joy’s hands move down her underwear, but she still is looking at the same spot and saying the same thing “So about your Pokémon...” As you keep looking at her you start to see tears forming in her eyes and her words start to get slower. “So... about... your... Pokémon...” she says as you notice her start to breath heavier. You know what’s coming next. “So (heaving breathing). about (heavy breathing) your (heavy breathing) Pokémon (heavy breathing). Tears start running down her face as you see her panties get a little wet. You then see some liquid run down her legs and hit the floor. It starts to make a small puddle. You press the pause button. “S..o a...” she stopes talking, her tears stop running down her face and her hand stops moving.
11333.title: Something New

113333.content: You are to distracted looking a Nurse Joy you don’t notice someone new come in “Hi Nurse Joy I just came in to pick the Poliwhirl I left here.” The girl walks in the room and steps in the puddle. She looks down. “Ew what is this thing I just stepped in. She then look at you. You now you this is Lily one of Mistys sisters. “What are you looking at.” She says as she turns and looks a Nurse Joy in shock. “Nurse Joy what happened to you.” She runs over to her. She try’s to shake her, but nothing. Then she looks at you. “ You did something to her didn’t you.” You hold the remote in front of her face. “Ha, what are you planning to do with that thing.” You press one of the buttons
113333.title: Someone Shows Up

1133332.content: “Give me that.” Lily says as she tries to reach for the remote. She almost gets it too but you press the button and her arm falls. She then falls back and lands in the same puddle as before. As she sits there on the floor she doesn’t say anything she just starts to remove her orange dress. She then throws the dress to the side as it lands back down in the puddle. Then she gets up. You now she her still wear her now dirty white shoes. She also wearing a orange bra and underwear with pokeballs on them. She looks right at you. “Look at what you’ve done to me. Now I’m all cover in this sticky stuff.” She sound really mad but she doesn’t realize she had taken off her dress. “Give that remote to me!” She starts moving towards you. You press a button on the remote.
1133332.title: Function 6

11333321.content: You smile as you press another button on the remote. You notice the remote feels hotter then before but you don’t care as you see Lily fall to the ground again. She puts one of her hands down her panties and you here hear start to moan. It gets louder and louder. “Quite down or someone will find out.” You press the sound down button but nothing. You then look a the back of the remote and see the light go from green to red. You look back at Lily and see her eyes start to tear up. You see a wet spot on her panties. The liquid starts to hit the floor as Lily looks up at you. “Aren’t you going to help me” She says as her breathing slows.
11333321.title: Function 7

info.brief_description: Well on a Pokémon adventure you come a cross a strange remote
info.description: Just follow the rules of the remote
